Body:
app = Cocopot()
@app.route('/hello')
def hello():
    return 'ok'
c = CocopotClient(app)
r = c.open('/hello', content_type='application/x-www-form-urlencoded', form
    ={'c': 1, 'd': 'woo'})
assert r[0] == b'ok'
assert r[1] == '200 OK'
files = {'a.txt': FileUpload(BytesIO(to_bytes('text default')), 'file1',
    'a.txt', headers={'Content-Type': 'text/plain'}), 'a.html': FileUpload(
    BytesIO(to_bytes('<!DOCTYPE html><title>Content of a.html.</title>')),
    'file2', 'a.html', headers={'Content-Type': 'text/plain'}), 'b.txt':
    'b txt content'}
c = CocopotClient(app)
r = c.open('/hello', content_type='multipart/form-data', form={'text':
    'text default'}, files=files)
assert r[0] == b'ok'
assert r[1] == '200 OK'
c = CocopotClient(app)
r = c.open('/hello', content_type='text/plain', input_stream=BytesIO())
assert r[0] == b'ok'
assert r[1] == '200 OK'
